metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14340 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in XNIO where file descriptor leak caused by growing amounts of NIO Selector file handles between garbage collection cycles. It may allow the attacker to cause a denial of service. It affects XNIO versions 3.6.0.Beta1 through 3.8.1.Final.

criterions.comment: jboss-xnio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
